actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the Parliamentary elections to be held in Venezuela on September 26, 2010.
subjects: Rule of law and government transparency

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the people and government of the United States: (1) support the right of the people of Venezuela to free elections and to the freedoms of speech and assembly; and (2) reject any effort by President Chavez to invoke the punitive power of the state to intimidate the people of Venezuelan who exercise these rights and freedoms.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the Parliamentary elections to be held in Venezuela on September 26, 2010.
